[Open Access] Download the Coronavirus Open Research Dataset

Download the COVID-19 Open Research Dataset, an extensive machine-readable full text resource of scientific literature with tens of thousands of articles about coronavirus.

Follow the latest COVID-19 research

Stay on top of the latest coronavirus research with an AI-powered adaptive research feed, a free service from Semantic Scholar.

Stay Connected With Semantic Scholar

About Semantic Scholar

Semantic Scholar is a free, AI-powered research tool for scientific literature, based at the Allen Institute for AI.

Learn More â†’ Link: https://pages.semanticscholar.org/about-us
